meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Paula Currall Matt DeTura Sara Wilkinson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6001.

td.p: Paula Currall, a stay-at-home mom from Oakton, Virginia
Matt DeTura, a recent law school graduate from Washington, D.C.
Sara Wilkinson, a country club concierge from Athens, Georgia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $72,701)

tr.td: AMERICAN HISTORY
TV SHOW ADDRESSES
IT'S A MARSHMALLOW WORLD
THAT'S BORDERLINE
I GIVE YOU AN "NCH"
YOU TAKE A MILE

Sara
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
